Plot: Max Walker, an officer for a security agency that regulates time travel, must fend for his life against a shady politician who's intent on changing the past to control the future.
Title: Timecop
Writer: Mark Verheiden (screenplay), Mike Richardson (story), Mark Verheiden (story), Mike Richardson (comic series), Mark Verheiden (comic series)
Actors: Jean-Claude Van Damme, Mia Sara, Ron Silver, Bruce McGill
